definition: south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi

sentences.english: Madame Xian Tai was the chief of the Baiyue ethnic group in the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 冼夫人是嶺南百越族的一位首領。

sentences.english: From the historical perspective, there is a staged meaning that the Nanyue Kingdom explored the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史上看，南越王國對嶺南開發有着階段性的意義。

sentences.english: Taishan is well known as the hometown of overseas Chinese in Southern China.
sentences.chinese: 台山是我國嶺南著名的華僑之鄉。

sentences.english: The west garden in Liuhua Park is a famous miniascape garden and one of the excellence Lingnan Gardens.
sentences.chinese: 流花西苑是廣州著名的盆景園，也是嶺南園林的精品。

sentences.english: In a word. East River Region was the economic barycenter of Lingnan in Eastern Zhou Period.
sentences.chinese: 歸納之，東周時期東江流域是嶺南的經濟重心。

sentences.english: It can be said that The Xielu Villa can be a window to display the Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，謝魯山莊開啓的是一扇展示嶺南文化的窗口。

sentences.english: Guangdong and Gungxi both belong to Lingnan Cultural Area.
sentences.chinese: 廣東廣西本屬嶺南文化區。

sentences.english: This is also one of the main characteristics of Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 世俗性這也是嶺南文化主要特徵之一。

sentences.english: The southern Cantonese culture is a separate cultural entity.
sentences.chinese: 嶺南文化是一單獨的文化實體。

sentences.english: Nanyue Kingdom was an important regional regime in Lingnan in late Qin and early Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南越國是秦末漢初存在於嶺南地區的重要地方政權。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by Lingnan University and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由嶺南大學提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: Nanhan Dynasty is short, but it still affected the development of the Ling Nan area.
sentences.chinese: 南漢統治的時間雖短，但對嶺南地區的開發仍有影響。

sentences.english: There were five climaxes of immigration to Lingnan in history.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上先後有五次移民嶺南的高潮。

sentences.english: That program, CHEMBA (China Executive MBA in Guangzhou, China), is offered through a partnership between the Carlson School and Lingnan (University) College.
sentences.chinese: 該項目由卡爾森管理學院和嶺南學院合作辦學。

sentences.english: Secularity This is also one of the main characteristics of Lingnan culture.
sentences.chinese: 世俗性這也是嶺南文化主要特徵之一。

sentences.english: Banana is one of the four shaddock are lingnan.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉是嶺南四大名果之一。

definition: handed down in a family/family traditions
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
